Package com.hexaware.service

Interface ITaxService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaxService
public interface ITaxService
Interface for managing tax-related operations.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    CalculateTax(int employeeId, int taxYear)
    Calculates tax for the specified employee and tax year.

    Retrieves a tax record by its ID.

  • Method Details

    • CalculateTax

      void CalculateTax(int employeeId, int taxYear) throws TaxCalculationException
      Calculates tax for the specified employee and tax year.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - the ID of the employee
      taxYear - the tax year for which tax is calculated
      Throws:
      TaxCalculationException - if an error occurs during tax calculation

    • GetTaxById

      void GetTaxById(int taxId)
      Retrieves a tax record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      taxId - the ID of the tax record to retrieve

    • GetTaxesForEmployee

      void GetTaxesForEmployee(int employeeId)
      Retrieves tax records for a specific employee.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - the ID of the employee

    • GetTaxesForYear

      void GetTaxesForYear(int taxYear)
      Retrieves tax records for a specific tax year.
      Parameters:
      taxYear - the tax year for which tax records are retrieved
